quiz.question: Which animal commonly uses echolocation for navigation and hunting?

What psychoacoustic effect reduces perception of some sounds in presence of others?
Which atmospheric effect bends sound rays due to temperature gradients?
Which material transmits sound fastest among air, water, and steel?
Which mathematical transform underlies spectral analysis in acoustics?
Which instrument produces sound by striking a stretched membrane?
What physical process causes cleaning in ultrasonic baths?
Which term describes resonance that forms when wavelength matches boundary constraints?
Which instrument produces sound by vibrating an enclosed column of air?
What name describes ear sensitivity variations across frequency at given loudness?
Which facility measures total sound absorption using reverberation time changes?
